data.content:
Graves (Battle Professor Graves)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 6, 2020

Graves, the Outlaw, is known for his gritty and rugged appearance, but in the world of League of Legends, even the toughest characters can have a scholarly side. Battle Professor Graves is a skin that brings a unique twist to the champion, transforming him into a distinguished professor ready to teach his enemies a lesson they won't forget.

Released on August 6, 2020, Battle Professor Graves quickly became a fan-favorite skin due to its clever design and attention to detail. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers players a chance to experience a different side of Graves while still maintaining his signature style and attitude.

The Battle Professor Graves skin features Graves dressed in a formal academic attire, complete with a tailored suit, a bowtie, and a mortarboard hat. His shotgun has been replaced with a wooden pointer, and his bullets are now transformed into scrolls. The skin also includes unique visual and sound effects, such as the firing of scrolls instead of bullets and the sound of pages turning when using abilities.

One of the standout features of Battle Professor Graves is the recall animation. When Graves recalls, he pulls out a chalkboard and starts solving complex equations, showcasing his intellectual prowess. It's a fun and quirky animation that adds an extra layer of personality to the skin.

Graves himself is a champion with an interesting backstory and a unique playstyle. In the world of League of Legends, he is a former member of a notorious gang called the Dreadnova, known for their ruthless and lawless ways. However, Graves had a change of heart after a falling out with his partner, Twisted Fate, and now seeks redemption and revenge.

In terms of gameplay, Graves is a versatile marksman who excels in close-quarters combat. His passive ability, New Destiny, allows him to reload his shotgun, granting bonus damage on his next basic attack. His Q ability, End of the Line, fires a skillshot that deals damage to all enemies in its path and explodes upon hitting a wall or reaching maximum range. His W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that reduces enemy vision and slows their movement speed. His E ability, Quickdraw, dashes forward and reloads one shell, while also granting bonus attack speed for a short duration. Finally, his ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, fires a powerful shot that deals damage to all enemies in a line.

Graves is known for his burst damage and high mobility, making him a formidable force in team fights and skirmishes. His ability to dash in and out of combat, combined with his shotgun's close-range power, allows him to quickly dispatch enemies and escape dangerous situations. However, he lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen and can struggle against champions with long-range poke or crowd control abilities.

In the world of League of Legends, Graves has become a popular pick in both professional play and solo queue. His unique playstyle and versatile kit make him a strong choice for players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward champions. Whether you prefer to play him as a jungler or in the bottom lane as an ADC, Graves offers a satisfying and impactful gameplay experience.

If you're interested in learning more about Graves and his various appearances in League of Legends, this page is the perfect resource for you. Here, you can find information, videos, and details about all of Graves' skins, including Battle Professor Graves. Dive into the world of this charismatic outlaw-turned-professor and discover the many facets of his character.

Graves: The Outlaw

Release Date: October 19, 2011

Graves, also known as Malcolm Graves, is a renowned outlaw in the world of League of Legends. With his rugged appearance, quick trigger finger, and a thirst for revenge, Graves has become a fan-favorite champion for those who enjoy playing aggressive and high-damage characters. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Graves, his strengths and weaknesses, his background in the game, and his significant role in the League of Legends universe.

The Story of Graves

Graves was once a law-abiding citizen, serving as a renowned officer in the prestigious Twisted Fate Police Department. However, his life took a drastic turn when he was framed by his own partner, Twisted Fate, for a crime he did not commit. Betrayed and left for dead, Graves survived the attempt on his life and emerged from the incident with a burning desire for revenge.

With his newfound outlaw status, Graves embarked on a relentless pursuit of Twisted Fate, seeking to bring him to justice and clear his own name. Armed with his trusty double-barreled shotgun, Destiny, Graves became a feared and respected figure in the criminal underworld. His reputation as a relentless bounty hunter and his unwavering determination to achieve his goals earned him the moniker

Strengths and Weaknesses

Graves is primarily played as a marksman in the bot lane, where his high burst damage and mobility make him a formidable force. One of his greatest strengths lies in his ability to quickly burst down enemies with his abilities, especially his Q ability, Buckshot. This ability allows Graves to fire a cone of bullets that deals significant damage to all enemies caught in its path. Additionally, his W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that not only damages enemies but also provides Graves with a brief moment of invisibility, allowing him to reposition or escape from dangerous situations.

Furthermore, Graves' E ability, Quickdraw, grants him a dash and a temporary attack speed boost, making him incredibly mobile and difficult to catch. This ability synergizes well with his passive, New Destiny, which grants him bonus armor and magic resist when he dashes. This combination of burst damage, mobility, and survivability makes Graves a potent threat in team fights and skirmishes.

However, Graves does have his weaknesses. Despite his burst damage, he lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen. His auto-attacks have a shorter range, which can put him at a disadvantage in certain matchups. Additionally, Graves' abilities require him to be in close range to maximize their effectiveness, making him vulnerable to crowd control and burst damage from enemy champions. Proper positioning and timing are crucial for Graves players to excel and make the most out of his kit.

Graves in the Game

In the game, Graves is a versatile champion who can be played in various roles, including the bot lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) or in the jungle as a bruiser. His playstyle revolves around dealing burst damage, kiting enemies, and utilizing his mobility to outmaneuver opponents.

As an ADC, Graves excels in the laning phase due to his high burst damage and ability to push waves quickly with his Q ability. He can punish enemy champions who misposition themselves and secure kills with his ultimate, Collateral Damage, which fires a powerful explosive shell that damages all enemies in its path. In team fights, Graves can use his Smoke Screen to disrupt enemy vision and create chaos, giving his team an advantage in the ensuing skirmish.

In the jungle, Graves is known for his fast and healthy clears, thanks to his passive, True Grit, which grants him bonus armor and magic resist when he auto-attacks. His ability to dash through walls with Quickdraw allows him to navigate the jungle efficiently and surprise enemies with unexpected ganks. Graves' burst damage and mobility make him a formidable duelist, capable of taking down enemy champions in one-on-one encounters.

Graves' Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Graves' skins. From the classic Mafia Graves to the futuristic Hired Gun Graves, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the rugged outlaw look or want to explore alternative aesthetics, our page provides a comprehensive overview of all the available skins for Graves.

Graves, the Outlaw, is a champion with a captivating story, a distinctive playstyle, and a significant presence in the League of Legends universe. Whether you're drawn to his relentless pursuit of justice or simply enjoy his high-octane gameplay, Graves is a champion that offers excitement and satisfaction to players who are willing to master his unique abilities. So grab your shotgun, load up your shells, and join Graves on his quest for redemption!

Graves (Default)

Release Date: Unknown

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. As one of the original champions, Graves has captured the hearts of players with his rugged appearance and unique playstyle. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Graves' default skin and explore the details of this iconic costume.

The Story Behind the Default Skin

The default skin of Graves represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the game. Clad in a brown leather jacket, a white shirt, and a pair of worn-out jeans, Graves embodies the essence of a rugged gunslinger. His attire is completed with a wide-brimmed hat, a symbol of his outlaw persona.

Graves' default skin perfectly captures his rebellious nature and his determination to seek justice on his own terms. The worn-out look of his clothes suggests a life of constant battles and hardships, while his confident stance and piercing gaze reflect his unwavering resolve.

While the default skin may lack the flashy effects and visual enhancements of his alternate skins, it remains a fan favorite due to its simplicity and authenticity. It serves as a reminder of Graves' origins and his journey throughout the game.

A Brief Narrative of Graves' Story

Malcolm Graves, known as Graves, is a former member of the notorious Bilgewater underworld. With a troubled past and a thirst for revenge, Graves turned to a life of crime and became a renowned outlaw. Armed with his trusty double-barreled shotgun, he roams the lawless lands, seeking justice and redemption.

Graves' story is intertwined with that of his close ally, Twisted Fate. The two share a history of partnership and betrayal, as they were once inseparable partners in crime. However, a botched heist led to their falling out, and they became bitter enemies.

In the game, Graves is classified as a marksman, excelling in dealing sustained damage from a distance. His abilities revolve around his shotgun, allowing him to unleash devastating attacks and control the battlefield. With his unique playstyle, Graves has become a popular pick among players who enjoy high-risk, high-reward gameplay.

Graves' strengths lie in his burst damage potential and his ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets. His Q ability,
allows him to shoot a skillshot that deals damage to all enemies in its path, while his ultimate ability,

unleashes a powerful explosive shot that can turn the tide of team fights.

However, Graves also has his weaknesses. He lacks mobility compared to some other marksmen, making him vulnerable to champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities. Additionally, his short attack range requires him to position himself carefully in team fights to maximize his damage output.

Explore Graves' Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Graves in League of Legends. From his default skin to his various alternate skins, each costume offers a unique visual experience and allows players to further customize their gameplay.

Whether you prefer the rugged charm of the default skin or the flashy effects of his alternate skins, Graves remains a formidable champion with a captivating story. So, gear up, load your shotgun, and join Graves on his quest for redemption in the world of League of Legends!

Graves (Riot Graves)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 29, 2011

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his rugged appearance and deadly skills, Graves has become a fan favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is

which showcases his affiliation with the Riot Games development team.

Riot Graves was released on August 29, 2011, and has since become a highly sought-after skin by both Graves enthusiasts and collectors. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers a unique visual experience that sets Graves apart from his traditional appearance.

The Riot Graves skin transforms Graves into a law enforcement officer, complete with a riot helmet, tactical gear, and a modified shotgun. The skin features a gritty and rugged aesthetic, reflecting Graves' outlaw nature while also paying homage to the Riot Games team.

One of the standout features of Riot Graves is the attention to detail in his design. The riot helmet is adorned with the Riot Games logo, showcasing Graves' affiliation with the development team. The tactical gear and shotgun are intricately designed, giving the skin a realistic and immersive feel.

Furthermore, Riot Graves boasts unique visual effects and animations. His abilities, such as his Q ability
and his ultimate ability

are enhanced with special effects that align with the theme of the skin. The sound effects also receive a makeover, adding to the overall immersive experience.

Graves, the champion behind the Riot Graves skin, has an intriguing backstory within the League of Legends universe. He is a former member of the notorious criminal organization known as the Graves Gang. However, after a falling out with his gang members, Graves sought redemption and turned his skills towards a more noble cause.

Graves' past experiences have shaped him into a formidable and versatile champion. He excels in close-quarters combat, utilizing his shotgun to devastating effect. His passive ability,

allows him to reload his shotgun, granting bonus attack damage. This unique mechanic adds depth to his gameplay, rewarding players who can manage their reloads effectively.

One of Graves' signature abilities is

where he fires a smoke canister that creates a cloud of darkness, reducing enemy vision and slowing their movement speed. This ability is particularly useful for zoning enemies or escaping dangerous situations. Combined with his other abilities, Graves can quickly burst down enemies and control team fights.

However, Graves does have his weaknesses. He lacks long-range capabilities, making him vulnerable against champions who can poke from a distance. Additionally, his abilities require careful positioning and timing to maximize their effectiveness. Players must be mindful of their surroundings and make strategic decisions to fully utilize Graves' potential.

In the League of Legends game, Graves is often played as a marksman in the bottom lane, where he can farm gold and experience to become a late-game powerhouse. His high burst damage and ability to quickly eliminate squishy targets make him a formidable threat in team fights. With the right support and positioning, Graves can carry his team to victory.

On the page dedicated to Graves' Riot Graves skin, players can find detailed information about the skin, including its release date, RP cost, and unique features. Additionally, videos showcasing the skin's visual effects and animations are available, allowing players to get a closer look at the skin before making a purchase decision.

Whether you're a fan of Graves or simply appreciate the attention to detail in skin design, Riot Graves is a must-have addition to your collection. Embrace the outlaw spirit and join forces with the Riot Games team as you dominate the battlefield with style.

Graves (Sentinel Graves)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: March 4, 2021

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his gritty and relentless playstyle, Graves has become a fan favorite due to his unique abilities and engaging gameplay. As with many champions in League of Legends, Graves has received various skins over the years, each offering a fresh and exciting look for players to enjoy. One such skin is the

skin, which was released on March 4, 2021, and is available for purchase at 1350 RP.

The

skin transforms the rugged gunslinger into a valiant protector of justice. Clad in sleek armor and armed with a high-tech rifle, Graves takes on the role of a sentinel, defending the innocent and upholding the law. This skin offers a visually stunning and thematically fitting alternative to Graves' default appearance, allowing players to experience the champion in a whole new light.

The

skin features a range of impressive visual effects and animations that enhance the player's experience. Graves' abilities are given a futuristic twist, with his Q ability, End of the Line, showcasing a sleek energy projectile instead of the usual bullet. His W ability, Smoke Screen, envelops enemies in a high-tech haze, adding an extra layer of visual flair to the skill. Additionally, his E ability, Quickdraw, grants Graves a swift and stylish dash, leaving behind a trail of energy as he moves. Finally, his ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, unleashes a devastating energy blast that leaves a lasting impact on the battlefield.

Aside from the abilities, the

skin also includes new recall animations, sound effects, and voice lines. These additions further immerse players in the role of a sentinel, reinforcing the theme of justice and protection. The attention to detail in this skin is truly remarkable, making it a must-have for fans of Graves and those seeking a fresh and visually appealing experience in the game.

Graves: The Outlaw

Graves, originally named Malcolm Graves, is a former member of the notorious criminal organization known as the Twisted Fate Gang. However, after a falling out with his partner, Twisted Fate, Graves set out on his own path, seeking revenge and redemption. Armed with his trusty shotgun, Destiny, Graves became a feared outlaw, leaving a trail of chaos and destruction in his wake.

In the game, Graves is classified as a marksman, excelling in dealing sustained damage from a distance. His unique playstyle revolves around his shotgun, which allows him to fire multiple bullets in a cone-shaped area, making him a formidable force in team fights. Graves' abilities, combined with his passive, New Destiny, which grants him bonus armor and magic resist, make him a versatile and durable champion.

Graves' past in the game has seen him go through several changes and updates, with his abilities being tweaked to ensure a balanced and enjoyable gameplay experience. His lore has also been expanded upon, delving into his complex relationship with Twisted Fate and his quest for redemption. Graves' story is one of resilience and determination, as he fights to right the wrongs of his past and forge a new path for himself.

In the game, Graves holds a significant place as a versatile marksman who can excel in both solo and team play. His ability to deal consistent damage, combined with his mobility and durability, makes him a popular pick among players of all skill levels. Whether players choose to play him in the bottom lane as an ADC (Attack Damage Carry) or in the jungle role, Graves' impact on the game is undeniable.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Graves' appearances, including the

skin. Explore the various skins and discover the unique visual and thematic elements that each one brings to the game. Whether you're a fan of Graves' outlaw persona or prefer the valiant look of the sentinel, there's a skin for every player's taste.

Graves (Crime City Graves)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2012

Crime City Graves is a skin for the champion Graves in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on November 29, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. With its unique design and thematic elements, Crime City Graves offers players a fresh and exciting look for their favorite champion.

The Crime City Graves skin transforms the rugged and gritty gunslinger into a stylish and suave detective from the crime-ridden streets of Piltover. Dressed in a sharp suit, complete with a fedora and a long trench coat, Graves is ready to take on the criminal underworld with his trusty shotgun, Destiny.

The attention to detail in this skin is remarkable. From the intricate patterns on his suit to the smoke effects that accompany his abilities, Crime City Graves truly captures the essence of a hard-boiled detective. The skin also features unique animations and sound effects, adding to the immersive experience of playing as this stylish gunslinger.

One of the standout features of Crime City Graves is the visual effects on his abilities. His Q ability, Buckshot, fires a burst of bullets that leave behind a trail of smoke as they travel through the air. His W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that envelops his enemies, making it harder for them to see and escape. The ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, unleashes a powerful blast that leaves behind a trail of explosive particles, adding an extra punch to Graves' already devastating attack.

Graves, the Outlaw, is a champion known for his high burst damage and strong dueling potential. With his shotgun, Destiny, he can quickly dispatch enemies in close quarters combat. His passive ability, New Destiny, allows him to reload his shotgun, granting bonus attack speed. His Q ability, Buckshot, fires a cone of bullets that deal damage to all enemies hit. His W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that reduces the vision of enemies and slows their movement speed. His E ability, Quickdraw, allows him to dash forward, reload a shell into his shotgun, and gain bonus armor and magic resist. Finally, his ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, fires a powerful explosive round that deals damage to all enemies in its path.

In the lore of League of Legends, Graves was once a renowned member of a notorious gang known as the Twisted Fate. However, after a falling out with his partner, Twisted Fate, Graves found himself betrayed and left for dead. Seeking revenge, he embarked on a personal vendetta against his former ally, using his skills as a gunslinger to survive in the dangerous world of Runeterra.

Graves' story is one of redemption and revenge. He is a man driven by his desire for justice and his determination to right the wrongs of his past. With his Crime City Graves skin, players can embody this gritty and determined gunslinger, ready to take on any challenge that comes his way.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Graves, including his base skin and other available skins. Whether you prefer the classic look or want to try out a different style, Graves offers a range of options to suit your taste.

Graves (Victorious Graves)

RP Cost: Unknown | Release Date: Unknown

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his rugged appearance and gritty personality, Graves has captured the hearts of players around the world. One of his most iconic skins is the

costume, which showcases his triumph and success in the game.

The

skin is a special reward given to players who have achieved a high rank in the competitive ranked mode during a specific season. This exclusive skin is a symbol of skill and dedication, and it allows players to showcase their achievements in style. The exact RP cost and release date of this skin are currently unknown, but it is highly sought after by Graves enthusiasts.

Details of the Costume

The

skin transforms the rugged outlaw into a true champion of victory. Graves dons a sleek, black suit of armor adorned with golden accents, symbolizing his triumph on the battlefield. His signature shotgun is upgraded with intricate engravings and a golden barrel, reflecting his status as a seasoned warrior.

The skin also features unique visual effects, such as golden particles and a victorious aura surrounding Graves. These effects add an extra layer of grandeur to his abilities, making each shot and explosion feel even more impactful. The attention to detail in this skin truly showcases the craftsmanship of the League of Legends design team.

In addition to the visual enhancements, the

skin also includes new voice lines for the champion. Graves' voice takes on a more confident and commanding tone, reflecting his status as a victorious warrior. These voice lines add depth to the character and further immerse players in the world of League of Legends.

A Short Narrative: Graves, the Outlaw

Graves, originally known as Malcolm Graves, was once a renowned member of the notorious Bilgewater underworld. With his trusty shotgun, he made a name for himself as a feared outlaw, taking down anyone who stood in his way. However, his life took a dramatic turn when he crossed paths with the twisted sorcerer known as Twisted Fate.

In a fateful encounter, Twisted Fate betrayed Graves, leaving him for dead. But Graves survived, fueled by a burning desire for revenge. He embarked on a relentless quest to track down Twisted Fate and make him pay for his betrayal. Along the way, Graves encountered other champions and formed unlikely alliances, all in pursuit of his ultimate goal.

Graves' journey eventually led him to the League of Legends, a place where champions from all corners of the world gather to prove their worth. With his exceptional marksmanship and unwavering determination, Graves quickly established himself as a formidable force on the Fields of Justice. His unique abilities, such as his quick-draw shotgun blasts and smokescreen, make him a versatile and deadly champion in combat.

Despite his rough exterior, Graves possesses a sense of honor and loyalty. He values his allies and will go to great lengths to protect them. This complex personality adds depth to his character and makes him a fan favorite among players.

If you're interested in learning more about Graves and his various appearances in the game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Explore the different skins and discover the unique stories behind each one. Whether you prefer the rugged outlaw or the victorious champion, Graves offers a thrilling gameplay experience that will keep you coming back for more.

Graves (Jailbreak Graves)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his gritty and rugged appearance, Graves has become a fan favorite due to his unique playstyle and intriguing backstory. One of the many skins available for Graves is the

skin, which adds a whole new level of badassery to this already formidable champion.

The

skin was released on November 29, 2011, and can be purchased for 975 RP. This skin transforms Graves into a hardened criminal, complete with a prison jumpsuit, handcuffs, and a bandana covering his face. The skin also includes new visual effects for his abilities, giving them a more rebellious and lawless feel.

Graves, originally named Malcolm Graves, was once a renowned member of the notorious Bilgewater underground. He was a skilled enforcer, feared by many and respected by few. However, his life took a drastic turn when he was betrayed by his former partner, Twisted Fate, during a high-stakes heist. Graves was left for dead, but he managed to survive and escape from prison.

The

skin perfectly captures the essence of Graves' criminal past. The prison jumpsuit symbolizes his time behind bars, while the handcuffs serve as a constant reminder of the betrayal he endured. The bandana covering his face adds an air of mystery and danger, as if he is always on the run from the law.

Not only does the

skin change Graves' appearance, but it also enhances his abilities. His Q ability, Buckshot, now fires off a spray of bullets that resemble shotgun shells, adding to the outlaw aesthetic. His W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that looks like billowing gunpowder, further emphasizing his criminal nature. His E ability, Quickdraw, leaves behind a trail of dust as he dashes forward, leaving his pursuers in the dust.

Graves' ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, is also given a visual makeover with the

skin. Instead of firing a single explosive round, Graves now unleashes a barrage of bullets, reminiscent of a prison break shootout. The sound effects are also modified to match the new visual effects, creating a more immersive experience for players.

Graves is a versatile champion who excels in both close-quarters combat and ranged engagements. His passive ability, New Destiny, allows him to reload his shotgun, granting bonus attack speed. This unique mechanic adds an extra layer of strategy to playing Graves, as managing his reloads effectively can greatly increase his damage output.

One of Graves' strengths lies in his burst damage potential. His Q ability, Buckshot, fires a cone of bullets that deal significant damage to enemies caught in its path. When combined with his E ability, Quickdraw, which grants bonus attack speed and dashes him forward, Graves can quickly burst down enemies in close range encounters.

Graves' W ability, Smoke Screen, is another powerful tool in his arsenal. It creates a cloud of smoke that reduces the sight radius of enemies and slows their movement speed. This ability can be used to disrupt enemy positioning, provide cover for escapes, or even deny vision in crucial team fights.

However, Graves does have some weaknesses that players should be aware of. One of his main weaknesses is his relatively short attack range compared to other marksmen. This makes him vulnerable to poke and harass from champions with longer ranges, such as Caitlyn or Ashe. Positioning and utilizing his abilities effectively is crucial for Graves to overcome this weakness.

Another weakness of Graves is his lack of crowd control. While his burst damage is impressive, he lacks reliable crowd control abilities to lock down enemies. This makes him more reliant on his team to provide crowd control and setup opportunities for him to unleash his damage.

In the world of League of Legends, Graves has carved out a unique place for himself. His gritty and rebellious nature, combined with his powerful abilities, make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you prefer the classic Graves look or the edgy

skin, there's no denying the impact this champion has had on the game.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Graves' appearances, including the
skin. Explore the different skins and immerse yourself in the world of this outlaw champion.

Graves (EDG Graves)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 6, 2017

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his gritty and rugged appearance, Graves has become a fan-favorite due to his unique playstyle and intriguing backstory. One of the many skins available for Graves is the

skin, which pays homage to the professional League of Legends team, Edward Gaming (EDG).

The EDG Graves skin was released on November 6, 2017, and can be purchased for 975 RP. This skin transforms Graves into a sleek and stylish version of himself, donning the colors and logo of the EDG team. With its striking visual effects and unique animations, the EDG Graves skin offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

When playing as EDG Graves, players will notice several changes to his appearance. His traditional cowboy hat is replaced with a sleek black cap, adorned with the EDG logo. His outfit is also modified, featuring the team's colors of black and white. The skin incorporates the team's emblem on Graves' jacket, giving him a distinct and recognizable look.

In addition to the visual changes, the EDG Graves skin also includes unique animations and sound effects. Graves' abilities are enhanced with new visual effects, showcasing the team's colors and logo. The sound effects are also modified to match the theme, immersing players in the world of EDG.

Now, let's delve into the story of Graves and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game of League of Legends.

The Story of Graves

Malcolm Graves, better known as Graves, is a former member of the notorious Bilgewater underworld. With a troubled past and a thirst for revenge, Graves is a relentless gunslinger who seeks justice on the twisted streets of Runeterra.

Graves' story begins in the lawless city of Bilgewater, where he made a name for himself as a skilled and ruthless enforcer. He was feared by many and respected by few. However, his life took a drastic turn when he crossed paths with Twisted Fate, a charismatic gambler with a knack for trouble.

Together, Graves and Twisted Fate formed an unlikely partnership, embarking on daring heists and dangerous adventures. They became infamous throughout Bilgewater, leaving a trail of chaos and destruction in their wake. However, their partnership was short-lived when a heist went wrong, resulting in Graves being betrayed and left for dead.

Graves survived the betrayal but was consumed by a burning desire for revenge. He dedicated his life to tracking down Twisted Fate and those who wronged him. Armed with his trusty double-barreled shotgun, Destiny, Graves became a force to be reckoned with.

In the game of League of Legends, Graves is classified as a Marksman, specializing in dealing high amounts of damage from a distance. His unique playstyle revolves around his shotgun, which allows him to unleash devastating attacks on his enemies. Graves' abilities include Buckshot, which fires a cone of bullets, and Smoke Screen, which creates a cloud of smoke that hinders enemy vision.

Graves' strengths lie in his burst damage and mobility. His abilities allow him to quickly burst down enemies, making him a formidable threat in team fights. Additionally, his Quickdraw ability grants him increased movement speed and a dash, allowing him to reposition himself and escape dangerous situations.

However, Graves also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustained damage compared to other marksmen, making him less effective in prolonged fights. Additionally, his short attack range puts him at a disadvantage against champions with longer ranges.

Despite his weaknesses, Graves has found his place in the game as a versatile and high-impact champion. His ability to quickly burst down enemies and his mobility make him a popular pick in both professional and casual play. With the EDG Graves skin, players can now showcase their support for the Edward Gaming team while enjoying the thrilling gameplay of Graves.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Graves, including the EDG Graves skin. Explore the various skins available for Graves and discover the unique visual and gameplay experiences they offer.

Graves (Cutthroat Graves)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: May 23, 2012

Graves, the Outlaw, is a renowned champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his rugged appearance and fearless attitude, Graves has become a fan favorite among players. One of his most iconic skins is

which adds a touch of pirate flair to his already impressive arsenal.

The

skin was released on May 23, 2012, and has since become a highly sought-after cosmetic item for Graves enthusiasts. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers players a chance to transform Graves into a swashbuckling pirate, complete with a new outfit, weapon, and visual effects.

Details of the Costume

When equipped with the

skin, Graves undergoes a dramatic transformation. He ditches his traditional cowboy attire for a pirate-inspired ensemble, featuring a tattered red coat, a tricorn hat adorned with a skull and crossbones, and a pair of worn-out boots. His signature shotgun, Destiny, is also given a pirate-themed makeover, with a wooden stock, a rusty barrel, and a menacing skull carved into the weapon's handle.

Furthermore, the

skin introduces new visual effects to Graves' abilities. His basic attacks now emit a trail of smoke, giving them a more menacing and pirate-like appearance. Additionally, his Q ability, Buckshot, fires a volley of cannonballs instead of bullets, while his W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of gunpowder smoke that obscures the vision of enemies. Finally, his ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, unleashes a barrage of explosive cannonballs, leaving a trail of destruction in its wake.

Overall, the

skin offers players a unique and visually appealing way to experience the champion. Whether you're a fan of pirates or simply looking to add some flair to your gameplay, this skin is a must-have for any Graves enthusiast.

The Story of Graves

Malcolm Graves, known simply as Graves, is a former renowned outlaw turned vigilante. Born and raised in the lawless city of Bilgewater, Graves grew up in a world of crime and corruption. He made a name for himself as a skilled gunslinger, feared by both his allies and enemies.

Graves' past in the game is closely tied to another champion, Twisted Fate. The two were once partners in crime, pulling off daring heists and outsmarting their adversaries. However, their partnership came to an abrupt end when Twisted Fate betrayed Graves during a high-stakes heist. Left for dead, Graves survived and sought revenge against his former ally.

In the game, Graves is classified as a marksman, excelling at dealing sustained damage from a distance. His passive ability, New Destiny, grants him bonus armor and magic resistance when he remains in combat. His Q ability, Buckshot, allows him to fire a cone of bullets, damaging all enemies in its path. His W ability, Smoke Screen, creates a cloud of smoke that reduces the vision of enemies and slows their movement speed. Graves' E ability, Quickdraw, allows him to dash forward, reloading one shell into his shotgun and granting him bonus attack speed. Finally, his ultimate ability, Collateral Damage, fires a powerful explosive round that damages all enemies in a line.

Graves' playstyle revolves around positioning and burst damage. With his shotgun, he can quickly burst down enemies, especially when combined with his abilities. His Smoke Screen ability provides utility by obscuring the vision of enemies, allowing him to escape or set up plays for his team. Additionally, his Quickdraw ability grants him mobility, making him difficult to catch or escape from.

In the world of League of Legends, Graves has become a symbol of justice and redemption. He fights against the corruption that plagues Bilgewater and seeks to bring down those who have wronged him. With his rugged charm and relentless determination, Graves has won the hearts of players worldwide.

there's a skin for every Graves enthusiast to enjoy.

In the world of League of Legends, Graves is a former member of the notorious Bilgewater gang known as the Twisted Fate. He was a skilled gunslinger, feared by many for his deadly accuracy and quick draw. Graves' strengths lie in his burst damage and mobility. With his high burst potential, he can quickly eliminate squishy targets and turn team fights in his favor. His Quickdraw ability allows him to reposition himself in fights, making him difficult to catch and giving him an advantage in skirmishes.

However, Graves also has his weaknesses. He lacks sustained damage compared to other AD carries, making him less effective in prolonged fights. Additionally, his short range puts him at a disadvantage against champions with longer ranges, as he needs to get up close to deal damage.
